name: Vector IM Slate UserStyle by sbts
description:
A 4 tone slate UserStyle (theme) for vector.im
This theme increases the visibility of rooms with highlights and unread messages while at the same time muting the "whiteness" that is the default

Contact the Author (dcg_mx) at
https://vector.im/#/room/#sbts:matrix.org
additional_info:
This UserStyle interoperates well with
Vector IM Crunch UserStyle by sbts
https://userstyles.org/styles/126880/vector-im-crunch-userstyle-by-sbts

Contact the Author (dcg_mx) at
https://vector.im/#/room/#sbts:matrix.org

This theme is also available in a github repository [here](https://github.com/sbts/UserStyles-vector-im)
